title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: United Cyber Week sale: Flights starting at 12,000 miles one-way
items.description: Flights are available to 31 destinations, including Japan, Australia, Thailand and Mexico, starting at 12,000 miles one-way for cardholders.

items.title: A forgotten hotel credit on a United card saved me $200 — and it was super easy to use
items.description: Sometimes there are valuable card benefits hidden in plain sight. Here's how one I almost forgot about saved me $200 on a hotel stay.

items.title: Save with 1 search: How Skyscanner simplifies trip planning
items.description: Many people assume Skyscanner is an online travel agent, but it’s actually a comparison tool with lots of neat features.

items.title: Amex Platinum Card members: Take advantage of your credits before the end of the year
items.description: Be sure you use your credits on the Amex Platinum and Business Platinum before the year ends. You won't keep your 2025 credits into 2026, so plan your...

items.title: The 10 best places to travel in January 2026
items.description: Whether you seek sun or snow, these are the 10 best places to travel around the world in January 2026.
